Literature.Title: Amphipathic alpha helical antimicrobial peptides
Literature.Author: Giangaspero A, Sandri L, Tossi A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:5% Hemolysis=10 µM,Human erythrocytes:20% Hemolysis=100 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ML-35(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=1µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=>32µM),Staphylococcus aureus 710A(MIC=>32µM),Bacillus megaterium Bm11(MIC=32µM),Candida albicans(MIC=>32µM),Cryptococcus neoformans(MIC=16µM),Aspergillus niger(MIC=>32µM)
